metadata.name: PowerShell Script Run in AppData
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious command line execution that invokes PowerShell with reference to an AppData folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\pwsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pwsh.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('local\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('roaming\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious command line execution that invokes PowerShell with reference to an AppData folder
